alert.note: Alert for Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:52AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR EAST CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN TENSAS...MADISON...RICHLAND...WEST CARROLL AND FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 452 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Darnell to near Crowville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Lake Providence and Transylvania around 505 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Baskin, Pioneer, Gilbert, Kilbourne, Forest, Richmond and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
